title: Store is down again
body: When will the store be back up?? just bought rp points and would love to use them. does anyone ever know when the store come back?

replies.body:
I don't know what the store will be up again, friend. But I can tell you that some very talented rioters are on the case and will have it sorted out as soon as they possibly can!

You can keep up with updates on this issue if you keep a tab open of the [Status Page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/). Let me know if you have any other questions.
